snippet.title: Vectoroids
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2182950/Vectoroids/

Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/vectoroids-e30c27

Microsoft: https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9pgh499ld7vz

Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/LoadUpGames-com-Vectoroids/dp/B0C7ND3J7K

Google: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.loadupgames.vectoroids


Blast your way through waves of asteroids and UFOs in Classic Mode. Or play as a team with up to 4 Players in Co-Op Mode. Battle your Friends in Deathmatch and Last Man Standing on 5 different Battle Maps!

FEATURES

- Arcade Classic Mode.
- Team Co-Op Mode (Up to 4 Players).
- Battle Mode Deathmatch (Up to 4 Players).
- Battle Mode Last Man Standing (Up to 4 Players).
- 5 Battle Maps.
- Robotic Voice Effects.
- Arcade Highscores.
- Gamepad Support.
